description:
A spare pair of socks to work with the Lenz Heat Sock battery-powered heated sock system. This slim fit version is ideal for narrower feet.

  • Socks are made of thick blend of synthetics, silk and merino wool that wicks moisture well
  • Integrated heating element wraps tops and bottoms of toes and forefoot for complete cozy warmth
  • Ergonomic shape works inside most winter boots
  • Padding on the shins adds comfort for hiking and skiing
  • Soft toe seams
  • Unisex sizes are designed to fit narrower feet: Small fits Euro 35-38, Medium fits Euro 39-41, Large fits 42-44
  • Socks only. Battery sold separately
name: Lenz Heat Socks 5.0 Toecap Slimfit (Merino and Silk) Sock (Socks only) - Unisex
